    Class for robot that sorts colours

    Aas, Mikkel, Karlsmoen, F. Jakob, Ronning-nyvold, Petter, Sandvold, Mathias

      • sortColor

        private void sortColor(int delay,
                       int currentColor)
        Method for moving the sorter to the correct position and dispensing the color block
        Parameters:
        delay - Delay defining (in ms) how much time it should spend moving the sorter before dispensing a color
        currentColor - Sets the current color getting sorted for the method to compare to the next

      • getColorID

        private int getColorID()
        Retrieves the current color to be sorted
        Returns:
        The ID corresponding with the color read
